channel.title: Wishlist: Mixminion
channel.description:
Mixminion is the newest anonymous re-mailer system and its security is better than mixmaster. Its more advanced and allows replies to messages.
Can you please include it in Whonix by default if its not? Its easy to install from Debian repos but it will lack the stream isolation settings necessary to make it more anonymous.

item.title: Wishlist: Mixminion
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
